title: Thoughts on Blizzard Games?
body:
You know, it's really all the cross advertising keeping me away from Heroes of the Storm

I wouldn't mind playing a bit of Hots, especially during the odd league downtime we are experiencing right now, but I know the blizzard machine will offer incentives and advertising for their other projects through the client and things like currency deals.

I feel Hearthstone is a bit of an expensive rip-off with it's financial economy balanced around  mobile gaming 

I have fond memories of Wow, but don't want to get sucked back in there.

I'm impartial about Overwatch, though i'm not a fan of their RNG only loot system

Diablo3 - Hit and miss. It had it's moments but i'm over it.

Starcraft 2- Wings of Liberty was awesome....I couldn't be bothered with the other two expansions as the story grew more predictable...maybe i'll see them through one day

It's interesting how both players and devs have migrated from Blizzard to Riot over the years
